lines.text:
[to Jim]
Say, fella. if Mary's the kind of gal you say she is, she loves you for what you are, not what you were.

[not seeing Buck tied up as he expected]
Roberts is gone. What happened?
lines.character: Marshal Tim McCall posing as Ace Porter

lines.text:
[to the gang]
Thought you fellas knew how to tie up a man.

[sarcastically]
Sure did a fine job tying up Roberts!

[final line]
Watch for THE ROUGH RIDERS when they ride again.
